ayas.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
I swear by the fig and the olive,

ayas.arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Certainly We created man in the best make.
Then We render him the lowest of the low.

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
ayas.translation: Except those who believe and do good, so they shall have a reward never to be cut off.
ayas.transliteration: illal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti falahum ajrun ghayru mamnūn

ayas.translation: Then who can give you the lie after (this) about the judgment?
Is not Allah the best of the Judges?
